content: a cup of tea a pastry a book some relaxing music a snuggle with a pet a relaxing knitting project = sunday bliss easy like sunday morning is my go-to vanilla sock pattern this toe-up pattern with a short row heel is a great starting place for beginning sock knitters is easily customizable and is written in 3 sizes for both fingering and dk weight sock yarn you can keep it simple or add some sporty stripes for interest or in your team colors if sports ball is your sunday bliss materials *approximately 60 - 100 grams of fingering weight yarn or 60 - 100 grams of dk weight yarn *approximately 10 grams of fingering weight yarn or 10 grams of dk weight yarn optional for stripes *size us 1 2 25 mm needles for fingering weight socks or size us 3 3 25 mm needles for dk weight socks *tapestry needle *scissors *stitch markers optional
